message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I know will be extremely valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you. I'm willing to part with it for a price of $1,250,000. This is a significant discount considering the true value, and I believe it's a win-win for both of us. Let me know your thoughts.
